media:group.media:description:
10 Business Chinese Vocabulary & Expressions You Need to Know
Do you want to get a job where you can speak Chinese? Then you will need to learn common business Chinese words & phrases. In today's Chinese lesson, we are going to learn the commonly used business Chinese vocabulary at work.
